description:
As the child heir to the Zabi dynasty, Mineva is the nominal leader of the Zeon renegades who took refuge at the asteroid base Axis. The daughter of Zeon admiral Dozle Zabi, Mineva was a mere infant when her people fled to the asteroid belt, and her whole life has been spent in preparation for her glorious destiny as the ruler of a revived Principality of Zeon. However, beneath the royal finery and behind the rehearsed speeches is a lonely little girl, starved of affection and longing for companionship.
Source: Official Site
She makes her first appearance as a new born in episode 34 of http://anidb.net/a715 [Mobile Suit Gundam]. She later appears in http://anidb.net/a719 [Zeta Gundam] and she is the female lead of http://anidb.net/a6517 [Gundam Unicorn], under the alias http://anidb.net/ch13499 [Audrey Burn].
name: Mineva Lao Zabi
